responsibilities: Developed an algorithm Bug Tracker that removed duplicate entry of records, resolved data inconsistencies, and prevented app crashes resulting in improved data integrity and optimized sorting and filtering of records.

Implemented a Custom Chatbot using FastAPI + LangChain + GPT-4 with integrated Prompt Engineering for accurate natural language understanding. The bot is capable of handling voice input, multilingual translation, command-based actions (e.g. create room, fetch user groups) and generating intelligent, dynamic replies.

Deployed a Generative AI project that creates realistic video advertisements and promotions of products using custom AI avatars and voice synthesis, capable of doing product promotions from any script that enhances user engagement and automating ad content creation for personal brands and commercial products.
Built and developed core backend of real estate management system handling property units, tenant management, and financial tracking with RESTful APIs.

Engineered a high-performance gambling application backend with real-time transaction processing, secure payment gateways, and advanced risk management algorithms ensuring 99.9% uptime and regulatory compliance.

Built a decentralized NFT marketplace using Node.js and Web3 technologies, implementing smart contracts for token minting, trading mechanisms, and cross-chain interoperability, achieving 500+ daily active users within 3 months.

Designed a comprehensive business monitoring and CRM system Timelapse analytics to track company growth, sales performance, and client activity patterns, enabling executives to identify peak sales periods, most profitable products, and customer behavior trends for improved business decision-making.

projects.name: API Rate Limiting Gateway
description: Built a lightweight API gateway with token bucket rate-limiting per user and per API, capable of handling 1M+ requests per day with minimal latency overhead.
Implemented distributed caching with Redis for session management and rate limit tracking across multiple gateway instances.
Designed comprehensive monitoring dashboard with real-time traffic analytics and alerting for rate limit violations.

projects.name: Cloud Cost Analyzer Tool

Developed automated cost optimization recommendations based on usage patterns and resource utilization analysis.
Built interactive data visualization components with filtering and drill-down capabilities for detailed cost breakdown.

projects.name: Timelapse
